overview: Every summer, hot bodied young singles flock to a hidden, hedonistic island just off the coast for a getaway where anything goes. But when a mad scientist sets up shop at one of the island's exclusive resorts to test out his new hypno drug, things really heat up for our horny heroes and heroines. Greed and global domination meet grunting, groping and gyrating in an orgy of - orgies in this titillating tale of terror in a two-piece. Will love save the day? Or will it plunge us ever deeper into this amorous Armageddon - this spandex epidemic of pandemic proportions - this - Bikini Apocalypse.
title: Bikini Apocalypse
